Perks

Non-taxable Dividends

Chit Funds have tac benefits, i.e, The dividends earned in a chit are not taxable.

Freedom to use funds

Absolute. Subscriber has the freedom to use the funds as per will.

Low Rate of Interest

On borrowing ROI is Low. Chit funds work under the principle of mutuality, you borrow from your future savings.

High Rate of Return

High Rate of Return. Risk free when compared to any other financial intermediary.
